title: Auto insurance claims and repair estimates
dataVerified: Claimant name, vehicle VIN, accident details, repair estimate, adjuster
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents inflated repair estimates. Domain binding verifies body shop/adjuster. Tamper-evident damage assessment. Fraud investigation. Prevents prior damage fraud (claiming old damage as new).
